en.name: Ghufran Indika
en.bio: Ghufran, founder of SabangKarsa, is committed to promoting Sabang to the world.

en.name: Dea Zasqia P. Malau
en.bio: Dea, manages branding and content, ensuring the platform’s identity are well delivered.

en.name: Shafa Disya Aulia
en.bio: Shafa manages SabangKarsa’s backend and maintenance, ensuring the system runs stably and efficiently.

en.name: Dian Islami
en.bio: Dian handles SabangKarsa’s frontend development, delivering an optimal interface and user experience.

id.name: Ghufran Indika
id.bio: Ghufran, founder SabangKarsa, berkomitmen mempromosikan Sabang ke dunia.

id.name: Dea Zasqia P. Malau
id.bio: Dea mengelola branding dan konten, memastikan identitas platform tersampaikan dengan baik.

id.name: Shafa Disya Aulia
id.bio: Shafa mengelola pengembangan dan pemeliharaan backend, menjamin sistem berjalan stabil.

id.name: Dian Islami
id.bio: Dian, mengembangkan frontend SabangKarsa, menghadirkan tampilan dan interaksi yang optimal.
